weapons that target friendly WINTERBITE units that are wholly within your territory) (Add 1 to prayer rolls for Call of the Blizzard when a WINTERBITE PRIEST is chanting that prayer) (COMMAND ABILITY Howl of the Wild; You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly WINTERBITE HERO and WINTERBITE ICEFALL YHETEES units wholly within 12 of that WINTERBITE HERO can fight at the start of the combat phase. These units cannot fight again in that combat phase unless on ability or a spell allows them to fight more than once)Mortal Realm Shyish Leaders Frostlord on Thundertusk  General Command Trait Wintertouched (Add 1 to wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly WINTERBITE ICEFALL YHETEES units while they are wholly within 12 of this general) Artefact Ethereal Amulet (Ignore the modify save rolls) Mount Trait Alvagr Ancient (If this model has not made a charge move in the same turn, enemy units that are within 3 of this model at the start of the combat phase fight at the end of that combat phase)Huskard on Thundertusk  Blood Vulture Prayer Pulverising Hailstorm (4+, pick a point on the battlefield within 18 of the model chanting this prayer. Wounds  , Rob Wales , Lemme tellz yoo abaat dis *Babi Bouldaz Dirtee Great (Big Waaagh!) Questin Da Waaagh Wudz. General (110 pts) Weirdnob Shaman Dag Bag da Blork Spitta*Bursting wiv power* he pee d on da rocks n den erf roar up n be dat baby boulda. He musta yuuzed is *Shamanic Skullcape* dat wot mak im bettaz. If dat baby boulder be Gud bestest boi maybeez da Blork Spitta sent im of on *Da Great Big Green Hand Of Gork* innit!(220 pts (110 x 2)) Warchanters Chuka Chonk & Muggs a Fungrel Deez Bois noz evry toonz innit, it maks all uz green Bois chargin bettaz and makes us skullz stich wen we bang r eds into too much ummie.(160 (80 x 2)) Wardokks Wazzok Grot Stompa & Gakk Slappa Dugee Bowff ov deez lads can dance innit. Du da magics n dat. Wazzok got a *Brutal Beast Spirit* but da bestest bit is Gakk Slappa whoze got da *Breath of Gorka Morka which maks greeniz float! He also got da *Mystic War Paint* which does more stuffz on rollz.(450 pts (180/10 + 270/15)) 25 Ardboys Dey hang abaat innit, making fingz ting or hedz splat wiv da iron ov da blades, Gud bois!(640 pts (320 x 2)) 6 x 2 Gore Gruntas Weez call em stinkkaz cos they du! Big bluur of da yelloz den blood har har har piggies!(120 pts) Ironfist battalion Deez bois iron gets fisty!(400 pts) Rogue Idol Baby Boulder!Dis ting just roars and stompz about vex d cos he waz Da Blork Spittas toilet! He run into things n den they fall down so he madder n he get more boulder innit! (360 pts) Savage Arrow Boys Da Boris Johnsaaanz!Deez ere blorky ippiz wanned to kill da Babi Boulder as he smash dere Waaagh Wudz and flung Blork Spittas poop in dere swampz innit. Blorkspitta sedz to da Johmsaaans, dat wez shud go find da Wudz bit togeva, so he spat on demz to be dere big boss now too!So now weez all Questin to getz deez Morkin Wudz back, deepaz in da land of monstaz but Dag Bag ain t Gud at herdin da Babi Boulder! Wez all bloody Gud bois! , Tom Gilboy , Lee Whitely ,  Ogor Mawtribes Mawtribe Bloodgullet Mortal Realm Shyish Leaders Slaughtermaster  General Trait Nice Drop of the Red Stuff! Battleline , 20 x Vulkite Berzerkers  , 10 x Vulkite Berzerkers  , 10 x Vulkite Berzerkers  , Units , 20 x Auric Hearthguard  , Battalions , Warrior Kinband  , Total  , Extra Command Points 1 ,  , Wounds 158 , Dominate – You immediately Complete this , Hidden Agenda if you control at least 2 more objectives than your opponent , (This Hidden Agenda cannont be completed unless there are 2 or more objectives) , Retake – You immediately complete this , Hidden Agenda if you gain control of an objective that was controlled by your , opponent (This Hidden Agenda cannont be completed if there are not objectives) , Linebreaker – You complete this Hidden Agenda , if all of the Battleline units from your opponent’s starting army have been destroyed , at the end of the battle, and at least 1 friendly Battleline unit is on the battlefield , at the end of the battle , Centre , Ground – You complete , this Hiddent Agenda if you control the objective closest to the center of the , battlefield at the end of the battle. If more than 1 objective is eligible , control at least half of them rounding up). , Count Heroes as 10 models when determining control of an objective for , this Hidden Agenda (This Hiddent agenda cannot be completed if there are no , objectives). , Invade – You Complete this Hidden Agenda , if a friendly unit with 3 or more models is wholly within your opponent’s territory , at the end of the battle. , Attrition – You complete this Hidden Agenda , if at least two thirds of the units from your opponent’s starting army , (rounding up) have been destroyed and/or are not on the battlefield at the end , of the battle. , Gary Subidai Bullha ,   Nurgle Festus the Leechlord Plague Priest on Plague Furnace Plague Priest on Plague Furnace Verminlord Corruptor  General The Contorted Epitome , 20 x Auric Hearthguard  , Battalions , Warrior Kinband  , Total  , Extra Command Points 1 ,  , Wounds 158 , Dominate – You immediately Complete this , Hidden Agenda if you control at least 2 more objectives than your opponent , (This Hidden Agenda cannont be completed unless there are 2 or more objectives) , Retake – You immediately complete this , Hidden Agenda if you gain control of an objective that was controlled by your , opponent (This Hidden Agenda cannont be completed if there are not objectives) , Linebreaker – You complete this Hidden Agenda , if all of the Battleline units from your opponent’s starting army have been destroyed , at the end of the battle, and at least 1 friendly Battleline unit is on the battlefield , at the end of the battle , Centre , Ground – You complete , this Hiddent Agenda if you control the objective closest to the center of the , battlefield at the end of the battle. If more than 1 objective is eligible , control at least half of them rounding up). , Count Heroes as 10 models when determining control of an objective for , this Hidden Agenda (This Hiddent agenda cannot be completed if there are no , objectives). , Invade – You Complete this Hidden Agenda , if a friendly unit with 3 or more models is wholly within your opponent’s territory , at the end of the battle. , Attrition – You complete this Hidden Agenda , if at least two thirds of the units from your opponent’s starting army , (rounding up) have been destroyed and/or are not on the battlefield at the end , of the battle.
